name: cala/market
description: A bustling desert market in the city of Cala.
style: Photorealistic Arabian Nights Desert High Fantasy

assets.name: market_stall
assets.description: A wooden market stall with a beige cloth canopy, sturdy wooden frame, and detailed joinery.
assets.prompt: An isolated wooden market stall with a beige cloth canopy. The frame is made of weathered wood, with visible grain and detailed joinery. The cloth is slightly worn and draped naturally over the frame. Fully transparent background.
assets.placement_notes: Place in rows throughout the market scene.

assets.name: stone_pavement_texture
assets.description: A seamless, tileable texture of cobblestone pavement with a rough surface.
assets.prompt: A seamless cobblestone pavement texture with rough, uneven stones in neutral lighting. The stones vary slightly in size and shape, with subtle variations in color from grey to brown. 4K resolution.
assets.placement_notes: Apply to the ground throughout the market area.

assets.name: palm_tree
assets.description: A tall palm tree with a textured trunk and lush, green fronds.
assets.prompt: A tall palm tree with a textured trunk, showcasing the rough, fibrous bark. The fronds are lush and green, fanning out in a natural spread. Fully transparent background.
assets.placement_notes: Distribute around the edges of the market scene.

assets.name: clay_pot
assets.description: A medium-sized clay pot with a smooth surface and earthy tones.
assets.prompt: A medium-sized clay pot with a smooth surface, earthy red-brown tones, and a simple, rounded shape. Fully transparent background.
assets.placement_notes: Place on market stalls and around the scene.

assets.name: fabric_texture
assets.description: A seamless, tileable texture of coarse linen fabric in earthy tones.
assets.prompt: A seamless coarse linen fabric texture with visible weave patterns. Earthy tones ranging from beige to light brown. Neutral lighting, 2K resolution.
assets.placement_notes: Use for market stall canopies and clothing.

assets.name: market_ambient_audio
assets.description: A bustling market ambience with distant chatter, bartering, and occasional footsteps.
assets.prompt: A bustling market ambience featuring distant chatter, occasional bartering sounds, and footsteps on cobblestone. Includes subtle background sounds of fabric rustling and wooden stalls creaking. 60-second loop, seamlessly loopable.
assets.placement_notes: Play throughout the market scene for ambient atmosphere.

assets.name: stone_building_texture
assets.description: A seamless, tileable texture of aged stone blocks with weathered surfaces.
assets.prompt: A seamless texture of aged stone blocks, featuring weathered surfaces and subtle cracks. The stones vary in color from light tan to grey, with some moss growth. Neutral lighting, 4K resolution.
assets.placement_notes: Apply to the walls of surrounding buildings.

assets.name: fruit_basket
assets.description: A wooden basket filled with bright red apples.
assets.prompt: A wooden basket filled with bright red apples. The basket has a woven texture, and the apples are shiny with slight variations in shape and color. Fully transparent background.
assets.placement_notes: Place on market stalls in various locations.
